name: Mahligai Hangus AR
description:
This is my project for subject Virtual Reality. You can download and install it in your phone now. ^_^

This application can scan the image and at your phone will appear the 3D model of Istana Kesultanan Melayu Melaka is burning! What is going on?

If you what know about this apps is, you can try download it at the link below.
